definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: structure (loan-word = benyon acc. to Lag:BN 205) applied

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: to enclosing wall of Ezekiel's temple Ez Eze 40:5;

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: to rear-building of same Eze 41:12, Eze 41:12, Eze 41:15, but rd. prob. [[בִּנְיׇה]] q.v.; so Sm Co;

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: appar. to whole temple Eze 42:1, Eze 42:10 (Co rds. [[הבית]]); cf. v:Eze 42:5 (del. Co);—Sm refers v:Eze 42:1 to enclosing wall, vid.
